page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CHRIS 1
page.content: On Saturday I went downstairs at about 9 o'clock.I fetched my telescope out and tried to focus it on a thorn bush.Then I tried a bird but they were too fast so I decided to have some breakfast.I had Corn Flakes and a drink of milk.Then I went upstairs to get dressed.I took my penknife out because I thought I would be constructing weapons or cutting branches.But first I went to James Pitmans house.We went into the wood for sticks,and I found the perfect stick for a catapult and James got me some elastic and we fixed it to the wood.Then I went home for dinner.I had tomato soup and a drink of milk.After dinner I went back to James house and we went back into the wood.Then we heard something that sounded like a chainsaw but it was really a motorbike.
